options.title: -d, --directory
options.description: create a directory, not a file

options.title: -d, --directory
options.description: create a directory, not a file

options.title: -u, --dry-run
options.description: do not create anything; merely print a name (unsafe)

options.title: -u, --dry-run
options.description: do not create anything; merely print a name (unsafe)

options.title: --suffix=SUFF
options.description:
append SUFF to TEMPLATE; SUFF must not contain a slash. This option is
      implied if TEMPLATE does not end in X

options.title: -p DIR, --tmpdir[=DIR]
options.description:
interpret TEMPLATE relative to DIR; if DIR is not specified, use $TMPDIR
      if set, else /tmp. With this option, TEMPLATE must not be an
      absolute name; unlike with -t, TEMPLATE may contain slashes, but
      mktemp creates only the final component

options.title: -p DIR, --tmpdir[=DIR]
options.description:
interpret TEMPLATE relative to DIR; if DIR is not specified, use $TMPDIR
      if set, else /tmp. With this option, TEMPLATE must not be an
      absolute name; unlike with -t, TEMPLATE may contain slashes, but
      mktemp creates only the final component

options.title: -t
